system.requirements: Navigator, RT Rank 1+. Had contact with the Elutrian Confederecy and been initiated into the teachings of the order.

description.value:
A Forbidden and shadowy path for a Navigator who may feel a strong aversion towards Psykers, seeing Navigators as the true destiny of Humanity and the witch to be distrusted. They are therefore taught ways to best eliminate such threats through their warp-eye.

Effects: Replace new Rank's Advances with that of the Elutrian Devotee Automatically Gain The Warp Unbound Navigator Power, and Rival (Astropaths) and Enemy (Inqusition) Talents.

system.effect:
Replace new Rank's Advances with that of the Elutrian Devotee
Automatically Gain The Warp Unbound Navigator Power, and Rival (Astropaths) and Enemy (Inqusition) Talents.
